SLA.HEADER: Thoa thuan muc do dich vu
SLA.DESCRIPTION: Thoa thuan muc do dich vu (SLA) la hop dong xac dinh ky vong ro rang giua nhom cua ban va khach hang. Chung thiet lap tieu chuan ve thoi gian phan hoi va giai quyet, tao khuon kho trach nhiem va dam bao trai nghiem chat luong cao nhat quan.

PAYWALL.TITLE: Nang cap de tao SLA
PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: Tinh nang SLA chi co trong goi Business va Enterprise.
PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Nang cap goi de truy cap cac tinh nang nang cao nhu quan ly nhom, tu dong hoa, thuoc tinh tuy chinh va hon nua.
PAYWALL.CANCEL_ANYTIME: Ban co the thay doi hoac huy goi bat cu luc nao

ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: Tinh nang SLA chi co trong cac goi tra phi.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Nang cap len goi tra phi de truy cap cac tinh nang nang cao nhu nhat ky kiem toan, dung luong nhan vien va hon nua.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.ASK_ADMIN: Vui long lien he quan tri vien de nang cap.

LIST.404: Khong co SLA nao trong tai khoan nay.

EMPTY.DESC_1: Van de do khach hang doanh nghiep bao cao, can xu ly ngay lap tuc.
EMPTY.DESC_2: Van de do khach hang doanh nghiep bao cao, can duoc ghi nhan nhanh chong.

RESPONSE_TYPES.FRT: Nguong thoi gian phan hoi dau tien
RESPONSE_TYPES.NRT: Nguong thoi gian phan hoi tiep theo
